The place doesn't have a sign. It's at the end of an alley but it's easy to find because there are a ton of people spilling out into the street. The cava is delicious. The food is even better. And our group (of 4 adults) had 3 glasses of cava each and dinner for a total of 25 euros. You can't beat it. I will definitely be back when I'm in Barcelona again!
